title.rendered: Australia Tour of Sri Lanka 2022: Squad, Schedule, Pitch report, weather report, Prediction, Venues, And Live Streaming Details

content.rendered:
Key Highlight

Despite the economic crisis and humanitarian outbreak in the island country, there is some optimistic news. The news is of the country’s home ground T20 series against the Australian team, which is starting from 7th June i.e., Tuesday. This tournament between will not only going to be a three-match T20 series but also a 5 Match ODI and also 2 match test series. The series itself is significant mainly because of the T20 World Cup, which is planned to be held in Australia between October-November this year.

Why Bhanuka and Wanindu?

Bhanuka who played in the IPL for the RCB’s was somebody very important for the team scoring big runs whereas the Wanindu was a name that every Indian cricket fan was chanting as their favourite. Wanindu the entire IPL 2022, was extremely successful and who took 26 wickets being the second highest wicket taker in the IPL. On the other end, Lasith Malinga has been appointed the bowling strategic coach of the Sri Lanka’s national team.

So, let’s understand, both team’s match details such as its venue of playing, Live telecast/Streaming Match Predictions and so on.

Australia Tour of Sri Lanka playing XI T20 squad

Sri Lanka T20I squad – Dasun Shanaka (c), Danushka Gunathilaka, Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis, Charith Asalanka, Bhanuka Rajapaksa, Lahiru Madushanka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Dushmantha Chameera, Nuwanidu Fernando, Karunaratne, Kasun Rajitha, Chamika, Nuwan Thushara, Matheesha Pathirana, Lakshan Sandakan, Praveen Jayawickrama, Ramesh Mendis.

Sri Lanka ODI Squad – Yet to be announced

Sri Lanka Test Squad – Yet to be announced

Australia T20I Squad – Sean Abbott, Aaron Finch (c), Josh Hazlewood, Ashton Agar, Josh Inglis, Glenn Maxwell, Kane Richardson, Jhye Richardson, Steve Smith, Marcus Stoinis, Mitchell Starc, Mitchell Swepson, David Warner, Matthew Wade

Australia ODI Squad – Ashton Agar, Aaron Finch (c), Alex Carey, Cameroon Green, Travis Head, Marnus Labuschagne, Josh Hazlewood, Josh Inglis, Glenn Maxwell, Mitchell Marsh, Mitchell Starc, Mitchell Swepson, Marcus Stoinis, David Warner

Australia Test Squad – Steve Smith (vc), Pat Cummins (c), Scott Boland, Ashton Agar, Alex Carey, Josh Hazlewood, Josh Inglis, Travis Head, Usman Khawaja, Nathan Lyon, Mitchell Marsh, Mitchell Swepson, David Warner, Mitchell Starc

Pitch Report and Weather Report– The pitch precisely is a balanced surfaced, which in other words is best for both Bowlers and batting side. Bowlers especially can use variations to secure a victory however, the rain or slight shower can add value to the fast bowlers.

Australia Tour of Sri Lanka 2022 schedule & Venue

T20 International (3 Match)

  • 7th June – 1st T20I, 7 PM Onwards, Colombo (local time), Venue – R Premadasa Stadium
  • 8th June – 2nd T20I, 7 PM Onwards, Colombo (local time), Venue – R Premadasa Stadium
  • 11rd June – 3rd T20I, 7 PM Onwards, Pallakele (local time), Pallakele, Intl Cricket Stadium

ODI (5-Day)

  • 14th June – 1st ODI, 2 PM Onwards, Pallakele, (local time)
  • 16th June – 2nd ODI, 2 PM Onwards, Pallakele, (local time)
  • 19th June – 3rd ODI, 2 PM Onwards, Colombo (Local Time)
  • 21st June – 4th ODI, 2 PM Onwards, Colombo (Local Time)
  • 24th June – 5th ODI, 2 PM Onwards, Colombo (Local Time)

Test Match International

  • 29th June – 3rd July – 1st test, 10 am onwards at Galle (Local Time)
  • 8th July – 12 July – 2nd test, 10 am onwards at Galle (Local Time)

Live Telecast & Live Streaming of AUS vs Sri Lanka based on regions:

In Sri Lanka

Live Telecast – Star Sports Network & Siyatha TV

Live Streaming – N/A

In India

  • Live Telecast – Star Sports
  • Live Streaming – Disney + Hotstar app

Pakistan

  • Live Telecast – PTVS ports Channel
  • Live Streaming – N/A

New Zealand

  • Live Telecast – Spark Sport Channel
  • Live Streaming – N/A

In the UK

  • Live Telecast – Sky Sports Network
  • Live Streaming – Sky Go app

In Australia

  • Live Telecast – Fox Cricket & Kayo Sports
  • Live Streaming – N/A

In US & Canada

  • Live Telecast – Williow TV
  • Live Streaming – N/A

Match Prediction

Sri Lanka, looking at their player from the IPL such as Bhanuka, Wanindu can add main value to the course but when it comes to the batting side it seems not that strong and needs to buckle up whereas in the Australian team, they players like Aaron Finch, Josh Hazzlewood, Glenn Maxwell, David Warner, Mathew wade which has a vast experience of almost all the formats of cricket and are expected to play well.

Final Prediction – Australia has strong chances to win this game.
